message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"can (to be able to do something); will (future tense)","sentence":"他们会唱。","image_prompt":"A group of people singing happily together, with their mouths open in mid-song, music notes floating in the air. The scene is set in a softly colored, slightly futuristic world with hints of blooming flowers and gentle crumbling structures in the background, evoking the atmosphere of a soft apocalypse animation style. The people look cheerful and unified as they sing.","sentence_translation":"They can sing."}
